data.title: CallFunc with Spawn bug
Fixed subtle documentation issues for better reading clarity
data.body: I fixed some of the grammatical issues and sentence flow problems. I did not modify any code

data.title: httpclient timeout binding for lua cc.XMLHttpRequest
Fix warning and a bug in FontAtlasCache::unloadFontAtlasTTF()
data.body:
I get the following warning when compiling on Xcode 7:

```
CCFontAtlasCache.cpp:269:44: Comparison of unsigned expression >= 0 is always true
```

The warning is caused by the line `CCFontAtlasCache.cpp:269`, and there is a bug.

``` cpp
if (item->first.find(fontFileName) >= 0) // Here is a bug
```

So I think the following code is better:

``` cpp
if (item->first.find(fontFileName) != std::string::npos)
```

This patch fixes it.

data.title: Adds xml support in UIRichText
data.body: Supported tags: - < small>: makes the font 20% smaller - < big>: makes the font 25% bigger - < img src="" />: to add an image - < font face="path to font" size="size" color="#00ffaa">: font attributes - < i>: italics - < b>: bold - < u>: underline - < del> strike-through - < br/>: new line Also adds support for strikethrough, italics, bold and underlie to `Label` Contains tests for UIRichText and Label Squashed commit of the following: commit a0d6ae0513d40dbf414930210ab032a49d8984a0 Author: Ricardo Quesada ricardoquesada@gmail.com Date: Tue Jan 19 20:39:21 2016 -0800 ``` cleanup LabelTestNew ``` commit 0cf423af85d88a42fc1317207feeb3d05da7f8ab Author: Ricardo Quesada ricardoquesada@gmail.com Date: Tue Jan 19 20:34:53 2016 -0800 ``` adds maaaany tests ...and fixes width and height in ``` commit e8ba6acd5d79bbc766d7aa02ef166e166c801d01 Author: Ricardo Quesada ricardoquesada@gmail.com Date: Fri Jan 15 19:41:37 2016 -0800 ``` Label + URL working Ok ``` commit 36689e29ee3d77310e92264a09084cc06e30664c Author: Ricardo Quesada ricardoquesada@gmail.com Date: Fri Jan 15 18:24:44 2016 -0800 ``` adding this code just in case... ... should use a listener component instead ``` commit af03708950e74483b875d0baad593aa6ed242a04 Author: Ricardo Quesada ricardoquesada@gmail.com Date: Thu Jan 14 20:23:36 2016 -0800 ``` URL node plus and

data.title: WinRT In-situ edit/password box
data.body:
Adds an "in-place" Win RT edit box that is comparable in feature completeness to Android & iOS.  We've used a similar implementation (pre UIEditBoxImpl-common refactor) in our company's mobile PFM app (Boeing Employee's Credit Union MoneyManager) for a number of months now with no reported issues.

Lots of credit goes to original implementation by @stammen.

Complete implementation will depend on a pending PR by a colleague @steerlink:
https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/pull/14914
- [ ] Unicode text not being displayed correctly in cocos2d-x CCLabel
- [x] Styles are wrong for Universal app (text aligned top instead of center, background is white instead of transparent)
- [x] Text doesn't persist when giving focus second time to edit box
- [x] Password chars should be \u25CF (Black Circle) instead of '?'

data.title: Memory leak  of
v3 added missing getFileSize() method for winrt
data.body: This pull request adds the missing getFileSize() method to winrt file implementation. This fixes issue #14737.

data.title: Add ability to get the font family
data.body:
The ability to know the font family is helpful for implementing custom rendering.

Additional fix for compiler warning where the return value from calling `first->find(fontName)` is unsigned and thus always >= 0. The proper comparison is whether `find()` returns `std::string::npos`.

data.title: Cocos2dxActivity sContext variable could cause memory leaked!!!
RenderTexture
data.body:
cococs2dx 3.9 lua


local pRenderTexture = cc.RenderTexture:create(display.width, display.height,cc.TEXTURE2_D_PIXEL_FORMAT_RGB_A8888)
pRenderTexture:beginWithClear(0, 0, 0, 0)
self:visit()
pRenderTexture:endToLua()
pRenderTexture:addTo(self, 999)
pRenderTexture:getSprite():getTexture():setAntiAliasTexParameters() 
pRenderTexture:align(cc.p(0.5, 0.5), cc.pAdd(center(display.size),cc.p(0, 250)) )


![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7121873/12418139/2f5395f4-bee8-11e5-8095-729209c2acc3.png)
